about_the_game:
The terror and horrors that lie within Abaddon will give every horror fan a unique and absolutely terrifying new experience. When you find yourself in the worst possible place, surrounded by unimaginable pain and horror with no one to rely on but yourself, hope is all you have left. Immerse yourself in everyone's worst fears and bring your lost brother back home. Stay alert, as you are not alone.

synopsis



In this first-person psychological horror game, you are lost in a maze-like, nightmarish world of terror. You play as 22-year-old Jimmy, who is searching for his younger brother, Georgie, after he disappeared under mysterious circumstances into a twisted world of nightmares and terror. Now, Jimmy must confront his past, his fears, and his regrets in order to find Georgie and escape the living nightmare. Though you are on your own, remember that you are not alone.

features:


Fear: Unimaginable Fear - A New Level of First-Person Psychological Horror Game

Plot: The immersive plot of the game is designed to test the player's sanity and bravery in a unique and terrifying story-driven gameplay experience, right from the first few minutes of gameplay.

Enemies: The video game villains in this horror genre are like none other, guaranteed to give you nightmares.

The Maze: The game takes place in a chaotic and maze-like world filled with everyone's worst nightmares. In order to face what lies within the maze, the player must possess both skill and bravery.

note From the Team:


We are an indie games studio called "Nice to Meet Studios LTD" that has been playing horror games for over a decade. Our love for the genre has led us to create "Abaddon", a game that aims to provide the best and scariest horror experience possible. Inspired by classic horror games such as Amnesia: The Dark Descent, P.T., Outlast, Visage, MADiSON, Detention, Resident Evil, and many more, "Abaddon" is designed to terrify players like never before.

Our goal is to make the players suffer and terrify them in a never-before-seen horror experience. If you think you're brave enough, we'd love for you to try to beat it - if you dare. Lose yourself in the world of "Abaddon"

content_descriptors.notes: This game is not made for everyone. It contains graphic and disturbing content, including blood, gore, physical violence, strong language, and substance abuse. This game is not recommended for those easily scared or the light-hearted. Play at your own risk, and enjoy!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specs are still being tested and optimization is being applied

short_description: Abaddon is a first-person psychological horror game steeped in Lovecraftian elements. Descend into a haunting story as you take on the role of Jimmy, searching for his missing brother Georgie while confronting his past in a nightmarish world.
